EmailTemplate.subject: Primary ASA Class lists
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please follow the links below to find the most recent ASA class lists. If your child does not have an ASA please contact me as soon as possible. If a child has not been registered by tomorrow, they will need to be collected from school at 3:00pm.
Reception - https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004Qay/31xCpvthuvmMe8ZURHIrHiKf9iWx8ec8CaoQgm7M__g= Year 1 - https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004Qb8/jTlcT1mzYzbhkIpr3OV0KVDholJ_m4.nrkQ5FkB2.zA= Year 2 - https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QbD/hlrJmhBHBH4PKGpm.sUj68jqLTSYOKGHKTq.IBO2l6c= Year 3 - https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QbI/K2AmAZuLIb4Siv2FqCv8aRMv5jRC0WeBo4ac2OoQRos= Year 4 - https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QbN/RIOiwx0iGKvqrFkFZEy8.20snwJ7wDeT4ODuYwHIEdw= Year 5 - https://eu1.salesforce.com/sfc/p/D0000000DDpn/a/D00000004QbS/_nl9YY2UZL2Z56w0nNbrIp0r5dGKXx.2ZC1ooDlSYZA=
Kind Regards
Sean Allday Year 4C Teacher
Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
